Room.Name: Orchid Wetlands
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a wetlands, surrounded by orchids of all colors.
Room.LongDescription: This is the second level of the Gardens, but you can get back to the first level by taking either of the southern exits. A sign warns you not to pick the flowers, as they have great magical properties and are used by Elise for her potions. To the north is a tower, which forms the the third level of the Gardens.
